text:
*5.* A better stylesheet support for *dnd email modules*.

*Detail:* We have this awesome DnD email editor, but still no way for responsive optimizations for our modules. I have tried everything, and the only thing I can do is, add the "display_block_on_small_screens" class from the DnD-grid styles to my tables.

*6.* Domain Header Include for *KonwloageBase*.

*Detail:* At least one way to include style or script files to the knowloage base. I would preffer if the domain header from site settings would work as aspected, this fix is overdue. But i would accept any way to apply custom stylsheets and scripts to a KnowlageBase.

One of my top needs for HubDB would be a module field for a HubDB select/multiselect column. I often find myself wanting to filter my queries within my templates by a particular value from a column, and at the present I enter those values manually into a choice field w/ the option label and value pairs.

A module field for HubDB select columns is a cool idea to extend this sort of data filtering to marketers! We are actually working on a different concept to allow developers to extend data filters to marketers, such as selecting values for select/multi-select. Would love to chat about it and get your feedback, feel free to book me here <https://app.HubSpot.com/meetings/wspiro>
